summary.span: 命名空间包含允许创建和使用独立存储区的类型。

span.span: The namespace contains types that allow the creation and use of isolated stores.

summary.span: 使用这些存储区可以读取和写入不太受信任的代码无法访问的数据，并可以防止公开保存在文件系统其他位置的敏感信息。

span.span: With these stores, you can read and write data that less trusted code cannot access and prevent the exposure of sensitive information that can be saved elsewhere on the file system.

summary.span: 数据存储在由当前用户和由代码所在的程序集分隔的隔室中。

span.span: Data is stored in compartments that are isolated by the current user and by the assembly in which the code exists.

summary.span: 另外，数据可以由域进行隔离。

span.span: Additionally, data can be isolated by domain.

summary.span: 漫游配置文件可以和独立存储一起使用，这样独立存储区将随用户的配置文件一起移动。

span.span: Roaming profiles can be used in conjunction with isolated storage so isolated stores will travel with the user's profile.

summary.span: 枚举指示隔离的不同类型。

span.span: The enumeration indicates different types of isolation.

summary.span: 有关何时使用独立存储的更多信息，请参见独立存储。

span.span: For more information about when to use isolated storage, see Isolated Storage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了大部分独立存储的必要的功能。The class provides most of the necessary functionality for isolated storage. 此类用于获取、 删除和管理独立的存储。Use this class to obtain, delete and manage isolated storage. 类处理读取和写入到存储的文件。The class handles reading and writing files to a store. 这是类似于标准文件 I/O 类中读取和写入。This is similar to reading and writing in standard File I/O classes. I/O 有关的详细信息，请参阅命名空间。For more information about I/O, see the namespace. 使用独立的存储的示例，请参阅[独立存储](~/docs/standard/io/isolated-storage.md)For examples using isolated storage, see [Isolated Storage](~/docs/standard/io/isolated-storage.md)
